name: claude-plugins
description: A marketplace for Claude Code plugins, containing Skills, commands, agents, hooks, and MCP servers

plugins.name: sqlc-go
plugins.description: Expert guidance for using sqlc with Go and PostgreSQL, including query writing, type mappings, and migration management

plugins.name: cloudflare-workers
plugins.description: Skill for developing and deploying Cloudflare Workers

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Create and edit Claude Code skills using Test-Driven Development. Runs baseline tests first, then writes minimal skills addressing observed failures
